Header: Phase II of Basic Tamil Language Course Concluded
Content: Stage II of the Basic Tamil Language Course conducted at the 64 Division under the supervision of its General Officer Commanding, Brigadier Jayanath Jayaweera ended during a brief ceremony held at the 643 Brigade on Thursday (4). The 4-month long course was followed by 22 students of under command establishments in the 64 Division. The closing ceremony was attended by the General Officer Commanding, 64 Division as the Chief Guest.
